dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 contains 60000 color images of size 32 Ã— 32 divided into 10 classes, each of which contains 6000 images. The training of targeted product quantization retrieval model is conducted on the training set containing 50000 images, while the test set is randomly divided into 9000 images as a database and 1000 images as queries.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: T. Chua
J. Tang
R. Hong
H. Li
Z. Luo
Y. Zheng
dcterms:description: NUS-WIDE is a large scale dataset for multilabel classification tasks, consisting of 269648 images, each assigned with one or multiple labels related to 81 concepts. A subset of 186577 images associated with the 10 most popular concepts is used for experiments.
dcterms:title: NUS-WIDE
